title: the ornn skin bundle
body: how much are the packs when a new champion is released, i have 1380 ready for ornn

replies.body: The new skin isn't that good but Yea idk I booted up the game and seen ornn and jumped the gun lol so the skin is 1350 rp full price. I remember when kayne came out the bundle made it worth it to buy
Those bundles haven't released quite yet, so we'll have to wait and see how much they'll be priced at once they hit the store.
